title: Great Little Player, A few Small complaints
author: Leah "Leah"
fullText: bought little 1gb player trip sony mp3 player charged via computer wont traveling laptop tiny weighs runs aaa batteries travel quickly learned lock keys playing buttons easily pressed runs battery gym bag ive started removing battery im using im fan music software player comes software functions flash drive click drag using music program overall im happy
